ABOUT CLOUD INTERACTIVE
A Machine Learning, Software Engineering, and Design Consulting Firm
WHO WE ARE
The Ultimate Synthesis of Design and Technology
We are a full-stack organization of Data Scientists, Engineers, Designers and App Developers. We provide an end-to-end Machine Learning, Data Science, AI, software design and development. We help business build machine learning models and AI solutions. Our San Francisco consultants work with you and our Taipei and Shanghai-based data science, engineering, and design teams to develop innovative and highly price-competitive solutions. At Cloud-Interactive, we can execute the entire project from scoping, data collection, to model development.
Founded in 2010, with operations in San Francisco, Taipei, Shanghai, and Tokyo, we have served clients across industries and around the world. From Tech, MedTech, eCommerce, Finance, Manufacturing, Entertainment, Fashion, and other highly specialized sectors, our diverse experience is our strength. We are internationally renowned for our creativity, project management, and ability to efficiently execute.
At Cloud Interactive, our clients are our partners. Our team leverages the latest and most advanced techniques in Machine Learning, Applied AI, UX/UI design, and software development.

Our Vision

To unleash the potential of our clients’ businesses by transforming their digital vision into reality.

Our Mission

To deliver innovative and industry-leading Machine learning, Applied AI, and software solutions.
OUR LEADERSHIP
Award Winning Talent, Elite Client Service
Cloud Interactive award winning designers and engineers represent the apex of their professions at the international level. We are fanatically dedicated to user experience design and software innovation. Our goal is to provide our clients with expertly tailored solutions and a revolutionary client experiences, , and in so doing help them realize their business’s potential.

Gary Chai

CEO

A San Francisco native with twenty years of global user experience for Fortune 500 companies, Gary drives the company strategy and ensures the successful outcome of each project. Gary graduated from the Rhode Island School of Design with a degree in Graphic Design. He started his career at Netscape, where he helped design the UI for Netscape browsers and Netcenter. Gary has a proven track record of building successful and profitable companies. Prior to Cloud, he was CEO for DesignMap Inc., an interaction design focused design firm, which was one of the top 40 interactive design agencies in America.During his spare time, Gary likes to spend time with his two daughters as well as race vintage sports cars.

Ashley Cline

VP of Sales, America

Based in San Francisco, Ashley specializes in Big Data, Machine Learning and applied AI consulting and outsourcing. She works with clients to identify, scope, and execute large data projects by leveraging a combination of machine learning and engineering consulting to provide a fully managed solution. Prior to Cloud-Interactive, Ashley spent 5 years with an outsourcing firm providing a range of data solutions tackling problems in big data and Machine Learning. Ashley especially enjoys work with computer vision and object recognition.In her spare time, Ashley hikes Bay Area hikes, plays soccer and attends as many live soccer matches as possible.

Rita Chao

Director of Business Development, APAC

Rita is an experienced Business Development Executive with a proven track record in the software industry. She specializes in Business Development, Strategic Alliances, Partner Management and Go-to-Market Strategy. She has helped many clients to leverage software solutions to build efficient business models and gain competitive advantages in highly competitive industries.Prior to Cloud Interactive, Rita worked at IBM and SAP as a Sales Director and Business Development Manager for over 15 years. To challenge herself after work, she likes to go cycling on the weekend, and go snowboarding in the winter.

Dominic Caudell

Director, Project Management

Joining in 2017, Dominic brings over 20 years of Software Development experience to his role as Director of Project Management at Cloud Interactive. His track record of excellence in project execution spans firms ranging in size from boutiques and startups to Fortune 500 enterprises. Dominic is an avid student of the entire Software Development Lifecycle and is an equally passionate advocate of Client Experience.In his previous role, Dominic was Lead of Retail Web Trading Global Teams at Charles Schwab. Dominic is a graduate of The University of Texas at Austin, and has also studied at Sophia University in Tokyo and NCCU in Taipei. He holds degrees in Computer Science, Economics, Chinese, and Japanese. Dominic hails from Austin, Texas.

Sean Lin

Director, Engineering

Sean studied design at Martin College in Australia. His interest in engineering and design started in university where his passion was to solve people's problems through user experience. With both a design and engineering background, Sean helps to translate visual concepts into functioning code across different platforms and connect them together in the Cloud.In his spare time, Sean enjoys taking care of his organic farm in the mountains of Taipei. He helped to design and develop a seed management system to help farmers manage, conserve and share Non-genetically modified seeds.

Kevin Lin

Mobile Team Lead

A mobile app developer with extensive experience in the development and testing of mobile applications, Kevin has worked in the banking sector in Taiwan as well as the fintech industry in Shanghai. A breadth of experience that includes e-commerce and electronic payments has given Kevin strong instincts and an industry-tested perspective on the future of the tec space. In the future, he will build a large mobile development team at Cloud Interactive to meet the needs of the global market.In his spare time, Kevin enjoys reading and learning across a variety of fields. He's also an avid traveler, using his time abroad to get first-hand experience about local market conditions. Always looking forward, Kevin is a student of trends in the Internet Era.

Hank Lin

Front-End Lead

Hank started his career at Cloud Interactive as a visual designer with a deep and nuanced understanding of UI/UX design. Through years of inter-departmental cooperation, Hank developed an intense interest in software development, as well as his own unique approach to front-end development. Fascinated by the rigorous logic demanded by the process, Hank took the plunge into the world of software. He quickly came to respect the wisdom of an industry joke: 'Front-end development becomes twice as difficult every eighteen months.' Undaunted, for Hank this is an inspiring reminder to never settle, and never stop learning.An accomplished amateur photographer, Hank started as a student and has never looked back. What started as an interest in making memory tangible has led to his current position: the exclusive, private photographer of his two sons.

Rex Liu

Back-End Lead

Rex graduated from Chang Gung University, with a Masters in Information Management. He's accumulated a rich array of practical experiences over the course of his career, working in data analysis, software development, system integration, and the implementation of back-end platforms, including desktop, web and mobile apps. As a back-end lead, Rex has worked on projects in the fashion, food and beverage, catering, wholesale, education, and gaming spaces. As a team lead, he believes that teamwork is the key to the success of any project. Therefore, in addition to building a capable back-end team with both front-end and DevOps capabilities at Cloud Interactive, he also encourages an atmosphere of mutual sharing and cooperation within the team.Outside the office, Rex loves live music, and a drink at the bar with friends on the weekend.

Cloud Interactive aligns Enterprise Strategy with Design to create Business Value
Cloud Interactive aligns enterprise strategy with Software Platform UX design to create value for your business. Our team is professional, creative, detail-oriented and, most of all, driven. Representing the top talent in their respective fields, Cloud Interactive's designers and engineers bring an industry leading approach to the creation of your custom software platform. Let Cloud Interactive unleash the true potential of your business.
